The schools and departments can be retrieved with `kth_school_dep()`:

```{r setup, message=FALSE}
library(kthapi)
library(dplyr)

kth_school_dep() %>% 
#  filter(is.na(`_id`)) %>%
  mutate(row = 1:nrow(.)) %>%
  select(row, slug, desc = `description.en`, website) %>%
  knitr::kable()

```
